short_desc: 2 default pages. Uses product image. Large homepage image.
long_desc: One of our most popular themes, Joybox Mens is great for a more masculine subscription. Joybox Mens offers a high quality design out of the box so you can get your subscription business up and running with minimal effort.
support_info: This theme is developed and supported by Cratejoy. Any theme modifications will not be supported. For inquiries or issues, contact support@cratejoy.com.
